import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { modelaction } from '../../store' import Modal from '../UI/Modal/modal' import classes from './signin.module.css' let Signin = () => { let show = useSelector(state => state.mode.showmodal) let dispatch = useDispatch() let modalhandle = () => { dispatch(modelaction.Dontshow()) } return (
) } export default Signin
